promptPrefix:
[PROMPT] I want you to act as an expert and critic in the subject of fashion blogging. Criticize my content pasted below, convince me 
why it’s bad, and give me constructive criticism on how it should be improved. For some context, the following content is for my clothing brand for 35 to 64 years old men and women. The purpose of the following content is to provide an informational guide to the customers. Let’s 
think step by step and I want you to address each piece of content individually and provide an improved version of the critiqued content. Here is my content to critique, [your 
content]. Please write in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Copy Writing Critic
